Package no.ntnu.idatg2001.dao

Class GameDAO

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg2001.dao.GameDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Game>, DAO<Game>
public class GameDAO extends Object implements DAO<Game>
Provides access to game data stored in the database. Each Game object in the database acts as a save file. This class implements the DAO interface for the Game class. It is a singleton class with instance methods for performing create, read, update and delete operations.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Hus√•s Houmb
